articles.content: The new film Sound of Freedom has been a hit with audiences. Unfortunately, it’s taken years to get to this point, with Disney having shelved the movie following their acquisition of Fox. They were t… [+1722 chars]

articles.title: SDCC 2023: India’s biggest-budget movie ever is Kalki 2898 AD - Polygon
articles.description: Previously known as Project K, the sci-fi epic, starring Prabhas, Deepika Padukone, and Kamal Hassan surpasses RRR as the most expensive Indian film ever.
articles.content: Previously known as Project K, the movie surpasses RRR as the most expensive Indian film ever made
